``morepath.compat`` -- Python 2/3 Compatibility
===============================================

.. automodule:: morepath.compat

.. autodata:: PY3

.. py:data:: text_type

  The type used for non-bytes text.

.. py:data:: string_types

  Can be used with ``isinstance`` to determine whether an object is
  considered to be a string, i.e. ``isinstance(s, string_types)``.

.. autofunction:: bytes_
